document_data.caption: A maps showing Taliat near the Great Sea.
document_data.name: Taliat
document_data.mainbody: '''Taliat''' was a small town found near the coast of the [[Great Sea]] in [[north Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography: Taliat sat along the northern branch of [[Al-Faddi River]] roughly {{SI|30|mi|k|long=yes}} northeast of mighty [[Qudra]]. The town was surrounded in lush cultivated land fed by the river and the few small unnamed lakes in the area. It was also found near a vital caravan trail that connected Qudra with the [[Free Cities of Zakhara]] in the north.
